component.attributes:
&input_component_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
mindate false java.lang.Object Sets calendar's minimum visible date. Can be java.lang.String or java.util.Date. If String, mindate will be parsed with the format "MM/dd/yyyy".
maxdate false java.lang.Object Sets calendar's maximum visible date. Can be java.lang.String or java.util.Date. If String, maxdate will be parsed with the format "MM/dd/yyyy".
pages false java.lang.Integer 1 Enables multiple page rendering if more than 1, default value is 1.
disabled false java.lang.Boolean false Disables the calendar.
mode false java.lang.String popup
inline|popup, Defines how the calendar will be displayed; "inline" only displays a calendar, "popup" displays an input text and a popup button
pattern false java.lang.String MM/dd/yyyy DateFormat pattern, default is "MM/dd/yyyy"
locale false java.lang.Object Locale for localization and date conversion, can be String or a java.util.Locale instance.
popupIcon false java.lang.String Icon of the popup button
popupIconOnly false java.lang.Boolean false When enabled, popup icon is rendered without the button.
navigator false java.lang.Boolean false Enables month/year navigator
timeZone false java.lang.Object String or a java.util.TimeZone instance to specify the timezone used for date conversion, defaults to TimeZone.getDefault()
readOnlyInputText false java.lang.Boolean false Makes input text of a popup calendar readonly.
onSelectUpdate false java.lang.String Specifies the components to update with ajax when a date is selected.
selectListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void selectListener() A server side listener to invoke instantly with ajax when a date is completed
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container of calendar.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container of calendar.
inputStyle false java.lang.String Style of the input text of popup display.
inputStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the input text of popup display.
showButtonPanel false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies the visibility of button panel that contains today and done buttons.
effect false java.lang.String Specifies the effect to use when displaying and hiding the calendar.
effectDuration false java.lang.String normal Specifies the speed of the display effect used.
showOn false java.lang.String Specifies the event to display the overlay in popup mode, valid values are "focus", "button" and "both".
showWeek false java.lang.Boolean false When enabled, week number of year is displayed next to each week.
showOtherMonths false java.lang.Boolean false When enabled, days belonging to other months are displayed.
selectOtherMonths false java.lang.Boolean false When enabled, days belonging to other months become selectable.
